item.title: LasLengua for Babbling Kids
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Health Management System
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: PillBox - Smart and Reliable
item.description: My first post using @narative/gatsby-theme-novela. Novela is built by the team at Narative, and built for everyone that loves the web. Headers It is recommended to NOT use H1s as it is reserved for the article heading. Any H1 is set as an H2. Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this.
